mapper.select: select u.user_id from user as u inner join `group` as g on g.group_id = u.user_group_id where g.group_code = #{group_code}
mapper.insert: insert into chatting ( group_code, sender_name, sender_id, chatting_time, content, receiver_id ) values ( #{group_code}, #{sender_name}, #{sender_id}, #{chatting_time}, #{content}, #{receiver_id} )
